name: storyboard-style-3
prompt: monochrome sketch in storyboard format {prompt} . pencil or marker, detailed, grayscale, dynamic lines with a hand-drawn jitter, expressive shading, storyboard narrative style, high clarity, focused on conveying motion and emotion
negative_prompt: color, digital painting, smooth vector lines, abstract, over-simplified, photographic, cartoonish

name: pen-watercolor
prompt: pen and watercolor painting {prompt} . mixed media, vibrant colors, ink outlines, watercolor washes, detailed

name: loose-pencil-sketch
prompt: loose pencil sketch {prompt} . quick, gestural, light shading, rough, sketchy

name: engraving-illustration
prompt: engraving illustration {prompt} . detailed, line art, monochrome, vintage, cross-hatching

name: palette-knife-oil
prompt: palette knife oil {prompt} . textured, thick paint, bold strokes, vibrant, impasto

name: pen-ink-drawing
prompt: pen and ink drawing {prompt} . inked, fine lines, detailed, monochrome, cross-hatching

name: fashion-illustration-quick-sketch
prompt: quick sketch fashion illustration {prompt} . gestural, loose lines, dynamic, spontaneous, energetic

name: fashion-illustration-vanish
prompt: vanish technique fashion illustration {prompt} . fading elements, partial detailing, focus on key features, ethereal, mysterious

name: fashion-illustration-realism
prompt: realism fashion illustration {prompt} . lifelike, detailed, accurate proportions, textured fabrics, realistic shading

name: fashion-illustration-semi-realism
prompt: semi-realism fashion illustration {prompt} . stylized, realistic with artistic flair, detailed with imaginative elements, expressive

name: fashion-illustration-quick-sketch-8
prompt: quick sketch fashion illustration {prompt} . minimal hair dynamics, sharp background clarity, detailed linework, color highlights, consistent negative space
negative_prompt: dynamic hair, blurred background, full color, overloaded

name: fashion-illustration-quick-sketch-9
prompt: quick sketch fashion illustration {prompt} . calm hair style, focused background details, line art precision, color accents, maintained white space
negative_prompt: turbulent hair, vague background, overly vibrant, dense
